title: The 2017 Smartphone Starter Kit
description: If you're buying an iPhone X or Pixel 2, this is your 2017 smartphone starter kit. Sennheiser HD 4.50 BTNC headphones on Amazon:  iPhone Lightning Headphone and Charging Adapter on Amazon:  Anker Fast Qi Wireless Charging Pad on Amazon:  MobilePal Wireless Qi Battery Bank on Amazon:   Subscribe!
